content: WTf does this klown have to hide? Why is he so afraid of others learning about him? This thing has to be a treasure trove of illegal business transactions and in bed with putin. Why is a republican saying we should leave the internet if we don’t like their intrusions on our privacy but Donna the PMS QUEEN has rights beyo0nd the ordinary citizen? If Donna the PMS QUEEN doesn’t like our demands for transparency, he can leave the WH. What is sauce for the gander is sauce for the goose.
